body:
Can't figure out how to create a guild, so - whoever knows how: please create a Motorhead guild.

It MUST be.  Thanks in advance.
body_html:
Can't figure out how to create a guild, so - whoever knows how: please create a Motorhead guild.

body:
I don't think he means a car enthusiast.  

Motorhead is amazing, but to be fair, there is already a decently active guild I've been enjoying, +NWOBHM.  No, not only Motorhead, but there's overlap.  You still interested?
body_html:
I don't think he means a car enthusiast.

Motorhead is amazing, but to be fair, there is already a decently active guild I've been enjoying, +NWOBHM. No, not only Motorhead, but there's overlap. You still interested?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: You don't have enough rep to create a guild. You need 250 rep before you can do that.
body_html: You don't have enough rep to create a guild. You need 250 rep before you can do that.
